snippet: Myanmar’s recent moves toward democracy may have inspired President Obama to visit next week, but the country’s impoverished majority still remains largely untouched by such progress.
abstract: Myanmar’s moves toward democracy may have inspired Pres Obama to visit, but country’s impoverished majority still remains largely untouched by such progress.
lead_paragraph: Myanmar’s recent moves toward democracy may have inspired President Obama to visit next week, but the country’s impoverished majority still remains largely untouched by such progress.

headline.seo: Obama Visit Underscores Lack of Change for Myanmar’s Poor
headline.main: Myanmar’s Rush to Democracy Leaves Its Poor Behind
headline.print_headline: Myanmar’s Rush to Democracy Leaves Its Poor Behind
